document_data.name: Iahn Qoyllor
document_data.mainbody: '''Iahn Qoyllor''' was a [[Deep Imaskari]] [[Imaskari vengeance taker|vengeance taker]]. He was sent out to find [[Ususi Manaallin]] in {{yearlink|1374}}.{{cite book/Darkvision|9}}
document_data.Appearance: Iahn Qoyllor had eyes like icy winter. He dressed with hide leggins the color of volcanic stone, and his leather vambraces were blood red from elbow to wrist.{{cite book/Darkvision|5-6}} Per a courtesan from [[Vaelan]], his arms were described as sinewy, and his skin as pale and exotic.{{cite book/Darkvision|107}}
